ing: 3/4 cup cooked truRootsÂ® Organic Germinated Brown Rice
3/4 cup black beans, rinsed and drained
Lime wedge, cilantro sprigs and hot sauce for garnish (optional)
des: "Organic brown rice is topped with black beans, salsa, shredded cheese, and avocado slices for a quick and hearty lunch."
ins: Spoon rice, beans and salsa into bowl. Sprinkle with cheese. Top with avocado slices. Garnish with lime, cilantro and hot sauce, if desired.
